title: KDSPY Tutorial | Keyword Research Using KDSPY Pro for Amazon KDP

tactics.name: Keyword Research via Seed Words
tactics.description: Use KDSPY Pro to extract Amazon keyword suggestions by inputting seed words and analyzing top-performing books.
steps: Click into Amazon categories to pull bestseller data
Generate word clouds for title keyword analysis
Analyze keyword suggestions and book performance metrics
caveats: High competition categories may require niche refinement
source_quotes: this pulls back all of the Amazon suggestions for this keyword

heuristics.name: Popularity Filter
heuristics.condition: If category BSR is below 50,000 then prioritize
source_quotes: this category is very popular and books here have good sales volumes

claims.statement: KDSPY Pro can segment book formats (Kindle, paperback, hardcover) within categories
source_quotes: KD spy will have the ability to segment them into unique tabs

niche_patterns.description: Identify categories with established demand but manageable competition
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances market opportunity with feasibility for new entrants
source_quotes: warning the competition here is very strong
